vehicles.name: Survivor Pickup
vehicles.desc: A pickup truck held together with wire and hope. She carries everything a wasteland family owns and she's the most common vehicle on the broken roads.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built pickup for immediate wasteland play. The starting vehicle for any post-apocalyptic campaign.

vehicles.name: Scavenger Trike
vehicles.desc: Three wheels, a cargo basket, and an engine salvaged from something else. She goes where cars can't and carries what bikes can't.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built trike for immediate wasteland scouting. Light, cheap, and available when nothing else is.

vehicles.name: Settlement Crawler
vehicles.desc: A tracked vehicle that carries an entire small community — living quarters, workshop, water recycling. She's a settlement that moves.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built crawler for immediate mobile-settlement campaigns. She's home, transport, and fortress rolled into one.
